title: Marlin - Grid Mode (2004)
description:
<a href="http://cdbaby.com/cd/marlinaudio" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">http://cdbaby.com/cd/marlinaudio</a> for clips


Great tracks for on the road, chillin out or riding your snowboard to!


"Marlin is but one man, holed up in his tree fort somewhere in the innards of British Columbia, with occasional help from a friend on flute or another on upright bass, creating some of the most soulful, laid back, bass and drum mix master driven songs since dj shadow started dropping bombs..."
-Brad Oates. Heckler Magazine.

Grid Mode: " An understated classic that weaves slide guitar, and sampled blues vocals around moody rhythms and bass dense tracks. Grid Mode is a seriously well-executed audio endevour of organically-soaked-West Coast electronica..." -Romina Wemdell. Exclaim Magazine
